Advisors.GENERIC_CONSULTING_COMPANY.Hints: A general firm (not a law firm) providing any other non-legal type of advice, such as: financial, accountability, due diligence, etc. It has to be a company/firm, not a person or group of people. Be aware that company names often include the proper names of their founders or CEOs and thus may be difficult to distinguish from people.

sentences.sentence: Stifel Nicolaus Weisel acted as financial advisor to Somaxon in the transaction .
Horowitz concluded his remarks by noting , " Daroth Capital Advisors acted as financial advisor to P & F throughout this arduous process ."
BofA Merrill Lynch served as exclusive financial advisor , and Morrison & Foerster LLP and Venable LLP served as legal advisors to EdR .

Advisors.LEGAL_CONSULTING_COMPANY.Hints: A law firm providing advice on the transaction, such as: government regulation, litigation, anti-trust, structured finance, tax etc. It has to be a company/firm, not a person or group of people. Be aware that company names often include the proper names of their founders or CEOs and thus may be difficult to distinguish from people.

sentences.sentence: Morgan Securities LLC served as exclusive financial advisor , and Hogan Lovells US LLP and King & Spalding served as legal advisors , to Greystar .
Barclays acted as M & A advisor , Citigroup acted as M & A and Capital Markets advisor , and Kirkland & Ellis LLP served as legal counsel to ArcLight Clean Transition Corp .
Advisors The Bank Street Group LLC acted as exclusive financial advisor and Morrison & Foerster LLP acted as legal advisor to ATN and F3C in connection with the transaction .

Generic_Info.ANNUAL_REVENUES.Hints: The past or present annual revenues of any company or asset involved in the transaction. Do not label half-yearly revenues and future revenue forecasts. Do not confuse with dates or generic numbers.

sentences.sentence: The Group 's turnover exceeded US$ 900 million in FY2008 .
Tishman has 900 employees across the United States and in the United Arab Emirates and generated revenues of nearly US$ 1 billion in 2009 .
According to the Electronic Retailing Association ( ERA ) , the direct response television industry accounts for more than 150 billion dollars in annual revenue .

Parties.ACQUIRED_COMPANY.Hints: The company target of a transaction. Must be a company, not a product.

sentences.sentence: They announced the acquisition from LEI of Liberty Media Corporation.
Homeland Security Capital Corporation announced today that it has completed the sale of its majority owned subsidiary, Security Holding Corp. (SHC), to Vuance Ltd., a provider of incident management.
( " Pernix " ) ( NASDAQ : PTX ) today announced the completion of its acquisition of Somaxon Pharmaceuticals , Inc .

Parties.BUYING_COMPANY.Hints: The company which is acquiring the target in a transaction.

sentences.sentence: With the team of James Clark , CEO and Board Chairman Phillip Nuciola III , Core acquired the oil and gas assets of both White Stone and Royal in exchange for common stock equity of Core .
The Merger Agreement provided for two mergers that resulted in DIRECTV Group and LEI becoming wholly - owned subsidiaries of DIRECTV .
Homeland Security Capital Corporation announced today that it has completed the sale of its majority owned subsidiary, Security Holding Corp. (SHC), to Vuance Ltd., a provider of incident management.

Parties.SELLING_COMPANY.Hints: The company which is selling the target in a transaction.

sentences.sentence: ABOUT FIRST STATE First State Bancorporation is a New Mexico based commercial bank holding company ( NASDAQ : FSNM ) .
With the team of James Clark , CEO and Board Chairman Phillip Nuciola III , Core acquired the oil and gas assets of both White Stone and Royal in exchange for common stock equity of Core .
Homeland Security Capital Corporation announced today that it has completed the sale of its majority owned subsidiary, Security Holding Corp. (SHC), to Vuance Ltd., a provider of incident management.
